bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PURCHASE-BASED SEGMENTATION

abstract.p: A method and system for purchased-based segmentation of potential customers employs the use of actual, observed purchases instead of presumptions and correlations to improve the accuracy of segmentation and involves collecting empirical data for a client on actual purchasing behavior of a group of customers and applying statistical modeling techniques to the empirical purchasing behavior data to identify segments or clusters of the customers that exhibit similar purchasing propensity characteristics. Thereafter, the segments or clusters are further differentiated from one another according to other factors having a tendency to directly affect actual purchasing behavior of the customers within the segments or clusters, and potential customers are then identified according to a correlation with the segments or clusters for customized marketing.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: método e sistema para classificação baseada em procedimentos de compras

abstract.p: "MéTODO E SISTEMA PARA CLASSIFICAçãO BASEADA EM PROCEDIMENTOS DE COMPRAS". A presente invenção refere-se a um método e sistema para classificação de potenciais compradores baseada em procedimentos de compra, que emprega o uso da observação real de compras, ao invés de suposições e correlações para melhorar a precisão da classificação e envolve a coleta de dados empíricos para um cliente, em comportamento real de compras de um grupo de compradores, e ainda a aplicação de técnicas de modelagem estatística aos dados empíricos de comportamento de compras para identificação de segmentos ou agrupamentos de compradores que exibem similares características de propensão às compras.

Após isso, os segmentos ou agrupamentos são ainda diferenciados entre si de acordo com outros fatores, os quais apresentam uma tendência de diretamente afetar o comportamento real de compras dos compradores dentro dos segmentos ou agrupamentos e potenciais compradores são depois identificados, de acordo com uma correlação com os segmentos ou agrupamentos, para uma ação de marketing personalizada.

abstract.p: A method and system for purchased-based segmentation of potential customers employs the use of actual, observed purchases instead of presumptions and correlations to improve the accuracy of segmentation and involves collecting empirical data (10) for a client on actual purchasing behavior of a group of customers and applying statistical modeling techniques to the empirical purchasing behavior data (10) to identify segments or clusters (12, 14 and 16) of the customers that exhibit similar purchasing propensity characteristics. Thereafter, the segments or clusters are further differentiated from one another according to other factors having a tendency to directly affect actual purchasing behavior of the customers within the segments or clusters, and potential customers are then identified according to a correlation with the segments or clusters for customized marketing.

abstract.p: A method and system for purchased-based segmentation of potential customers employs the use of actual, observed purchases instead of presumptions and correlations to improve the accuracy of segmentation and involves collecting empirical data for a client on actual purchasing behavior of a group of customers and applying statistical modeling techniques to the empirical purchasing behavior data to identify segments or clusters of the customers that exhibit similar purchasing propensity characteristics. Thereafter, the segments or clusters are further differentiated from one another according to other factors having a tendency to directly affect actual purchasing behavior of the customers within the segments or clusters, and potential customers are then identified according to a correlation with the segments or clusters for customized marketing.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PURCHASE-BASED SEGMENTATION
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE SEGMENTATION FONDEE SUR DES ACHATS

abstract.p: A method and system for purchased-based segmentation of potential customers employs the use of actual, observed purchases instead of presumptions and correlations to improve the accuracy of segmentation and involves collecting empirical data for a client on actual purchasing behavior of a group of customers and applying statistical modeling techniques to the empirical purchasing behavior data to identify segments or clusters of the customers that exhibit similar purchasing propensity characteristics. Thereafter, the segments or clusters are further differentiated from one another according to other factors having a tendency to directly affect actual purchasing behavior of the customers within the segments or clusters, and potential customers are then identified according to a correlation with the segments or clusters for customized marketing.

La présente invention concerne un procédé et un système de segmentation fondée sur des achats de prospects, qui utilise les achats réels observés au lieu d'utiliser les des présomptions d'achat et des corrélations pour améliorer la précision de la segmentation et qui consiste à recueillir des données empiriques pour un client sur le comportement d'achat réel d'un groupe de clients et à appliquer des techniques de modélisation statistique à ces données de comportement d'achat empirique pour identifier des segments ou des groupes de clients qui présentent des caractéristiques de propension à acheter similaires.

Puis, les segments ou groupes sont à nouveau différenciés les uns des autres en fonction d'autres facteurs qui ont tendance à directement affecter le comportement d'achat réel des clients répertoriés à l'intérieur de ces segments ou de ces groupes, et des prospects sont alors identifiés en fonction d'une corrélation avec ces segments où ces groupes pour élaborer un marketing personnalisé.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PURCHASE-BASED SEGMENTATION
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE SEGMENTATION FONDEE SUR DES ACHATS

abstract.p: A method (see Fig.2) and system (see Fig.1) for purchased-based segmentation of potential customers employs the use of actual, observed purchases instead of presumptions and correlations to improve the accuracy of segmentation and involves collecting empirical data (10) for a client on actual purchasing behavior of a group of customers and applying statistical modeling techniques to the empirical purchasing behavior data (10) to identify segments or clusters (12, 14 and 16) of the customers that exhibit similar purchasing propensity characteristics. Thereafter, the segments or clusters are further differentiated from one another according to other factors having a tendency to directly affect actual purchasing behavior of the customers within the segments or clusters, and potential customers are then identified according to a correlation with the segments or clusters for customized marketing.

La présente invention concerne un procédé et un système de segmentation fondée sur des achats de prospects, qui utilise les achats réels observés au lieu d'utiliser les des présomptions d'achat et des corrélations pour améliorer la précision de la segmentation et qui consiste à recueillir des données empiriques pour un client sur le comportement d'achat réel d'un groupe de clients et à appliquer des techniques de modélisation statistique à ces données de comportement d'achat empirique pour identifier des segments ou des groupes de clients qui présentent des caractéristiques de propension à acheter similaires.

Puis, les segments ou groupes sont à nouveau différenciés les uns des autres en fonction d'autres facteurs qui ont tendance à directement affecter le comportement d'achat réel des clients répertoriés à l'intérieur de ces segments ou de ces groupes, et des prospects sont alors identifiés en fonction d'une corrélation avec ces segments où ces groupes pour élaborer un marketing personnalisé.
